item.title: Product Manager @Heetch
Co-founder @Rapsodie
Co-founder @Deepdives
item.description: Intro This is part 2 (and last) of my entrepreneurial adventure with the amazing [Charlotte Moreau](). The first part is our attempt at launching Nabu’s sign language translation wristband. Status Personal Project ‚ò†Ô∏è February 2017 - September 2017 After Class This project’s objective was pretty simple: how could one keep learning about new subjects without being feeling old-school-taught or bored? We started with a first iteration as a messenger bot called Charade (try it out üá´üá∑).

item.title: Co-founder @Nabu
item.description: Intro This article is the first part of a 2 article-long adventure with the amazing [Charlotte Moreau](). I will write a dedicated article about the human adventure itself but let’s focus on the product and achievements for now. Status Personal project ‚ò†Ô∏è August 2016 - February 2017 Go Bears! When I left Paris for UC Berkeley (with a bricked computed) I never knew the “Jedi wristband” project I was bringing with me would follow such an amazing path.

item.title: Mechanical Engineering intern @Withings
item.description: Status Internship ‚úÖ February 2016 - August 2016 French Touch Withings might be one of France’s finest companies. Founded by serial entrepreneur Eric Carreel (who also founded Inventel, Scuplteo, Zoov…) their products have always pioneered in the health connected devices field. Their historic connected scale has enlightened the way for many more successful products such as watches, sleep monitors etc… During my internship I had the opportunity to work on the Steel HR connected smart watch along with Manon Navellou.

item.title: Mechanical Engineering intern @Dreem
item.description: Status Internship ‚úÖ September 2015 - February 2016 Dream Dreem Rythm’s @Dreem sleep headband aims at helping people sleep better by increase deep sleep duration through noise stimulation. In XXX 2018 they released their third iteration of the headband. I had the opportunity to work on the beta version that was about to be release at the time. During my 6 months internship I worked closely with the head of Mechanical Engineering on many key subjects such as
